definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
lit. to eat delicious food and drink hard liquor (idiom)/fig. to live well

sentences.english: I suggest Mexico chili bean soup if you like something spicy?
sentences.chinese: 如果您想喝辣一点的汤，我建议您尝尝墨西哥辣豆汤？

sentences.english: Cajun food is often very salty and spicy.
sentences.chinese: 路易斯安那州的菜肴，通常都是即咸又辣。

sentences.english: Some people may think this dish is sightly hot for their taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些人会觉得对他们的口味来说，这道莱有点儿辣。

sentences.english: This lime curry is particularly hot .
And the name of the daughter of Aser, was Sara.
sentences.chinese: 阿协尔的女儿的名字是色辣黑。

sentences.english: OhjectiveTo study the anti - acute gastroenteritis effect of Nuerfeng Lialiao Water extract (NLWE) of mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究牛耳枫与辣蓼提取物的抗急性胃肠炎的作用。

sentences.english: It is not so strong spice like normal ginger .
sentences.chinese: 它不像很平常姜那么辣。

sentences.english: And Bale died, and Jobab the son of Zare of Bosra, reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 贝拉死后，波责辣人则辣黑的儿子约巴布继他为王。

sentences.english: Laban gave to Rachel his daughter Bilhah, his handmaid, to be her handmaid.
sentences.chinese: 拉班且将自己的婢女彼耳哈给了女儿辣黑耳作婢女。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the contents of polysaccharide in leaves of Moringa oleifera.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定辣木叶中多糖的含量。

sentences.english: All the dishes in red are quite hot.
sentences.chinese: 所有用红色标出的菜肴都很辣。

sentences.english: Spicy, scented with distinct minerality. Hints of green pepper.
sentences.chinese: 辣，香气中带有明显的矿物味，一点点青椒。

sentences.english: From crispy to soft, sweet, salty, spicy and many other flavours all suit potato.
sentences.chinese: 由脆到软，甜，咸，辣和许多其他味道都和土豆相配。

sentences.english: Eat invigorator while can you eat hot?
sentences.chinese: 吃补药的同时能吃辣的吗？

sentences.english: Plus I love spicy foods, so my diet is anything but bland.
sentences.chinese: 而且我喜欢吃辣，所以我的食物总是口感强烈。

sentences.english: Only the chili con carne recipe remained unchanged through the years.
sentences.chinese: 只有墨西哥辣豆酱的食谱多年来都没有改变。
